A4.text: Sir Francis Drake was the vice admiral of the English fleet that fought against the Spanish Armada in 1588.

A5.text: The Spanish Armada set sail for England in May 1588, and arrived on the English coast on 29 July.

A6.text: The Spanish Navy, officially the Armada, is the maritime branch of the Spanish Armed Forces.
